articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Delegation 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Supreme Court of Russia led by President Vyacheslav Lebedev which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 The head of the delegation expressed belief that the bilateral friendly relations would grow stronger this significant year marking the 70th anniversary of the victory in the great Patriotic War and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from President of Supreme Court of Russia
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from President of Supreme Court of Russia
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Vyacheslav Lebedev, president of the Supreme Court of Russia, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Friday by Vyacheslav Lebedev.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Supreme Court of Russia led by President Vyacheslav Lebedev visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday.
					 The members of the delegation went round historic relics preserved with care, being briefed on the immortal story associated with his old home in Mangyongdae where he was born and nurtured the great intention of revolution while spending his childhood.
					
					 The head of the delegation said he was deeply moved, adding:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung is the peerless patriot who devoted his all to the freedom and independence of Korea and the great man revered by the whole world.
					
					 The old home in Mangyongdae where he was born is instilling a lot into the visitors.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Mansudae Art Studio.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun headed by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Returns Home
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government delegation headed by Vice-Premier Ro Tu Chol returned home on Friday after participating in the ceremony of opening the year of the DPRK-Russia friendship held in Moscow.

articles.title: Safe Return of DPRK's Trading Cargo Ship Mudubong Urged
articles.content:
Safe Return of DPRK's Trading Cargo Ship Mudubong Urged
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The manager of the Mudubong Marine Transport Co. Ltd. gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Thursday in connection with the fact that its cargo ship Mudubong has been interned for nine months in Mexico for an unjustifiable reason:
					 Mudubong, a trading cargo ship of our company, was stranded on coral reef off Tuxpan Port of Mexico on July 14, 2014 to be interned by the Mexican authorities for damaging coral reef.
					
					 After the accident we indemnified losses under Mexican rules including relief fund.
					
					 On January 17, 2015 the Mexican authorities sent an official document to us to inform that they would send the ship back to us and notified us that they would deliver a document on lifting the internment of the ship to us, too.
					
					 But the authorities are now not allowing the departure of the ship, claiming they received a request not to let the ship leave until a "decision" is made by the Sanctions Committee against the North of the UN Security Council.
					
					 A man who claimed to be a coordinator of experts group of the Committee instructed the internment of the ship upon the authorization of the Committee and spread the false story that the ship belongs to the Wonyang Marine Transport Management Co. Ltd. which is allegedly on the list of sanctions in a bid to freeze the sailing of the ship at any cost.
					
					 This is an unreasonable attempt from every aspect.
					
					 Firstly, Mudubong is a legitimate property of the Mudubong Marine Transport Co. Ltd., an independent corporate body that came into being under the law of the DPRK.
					
					 Our company, as a social cooperative organization that was set up in October 2008 with the money invested by individuals, has a certificate of investor and an agreement on the establishment of the company and a document confirmed by a relevant notary's office.
					
					 As an owner of the ship Mudubong, our company received business license from the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport of the DPRK and its business license number is 13-203.
					
					 Mudubong has ship registration certificate issued by the Maritime Administration of the DPRK.
					
					 The Mudubong Marine Transport Co. Ltd. has been registered as the owner of Mudubong and the identification number of the company is 5435991.
					
					 The claim that Mudubong does not belong to our company despite these documents recognized at home and abroad would mean depriving investors of their ownership and ignoring laws of the DPRK and it would be just the intentional negation of the authorized institutions of the DPRK that issued those certificates.
					
					 The claim that Mudubong belongs to the Wonyang Marine Transport Management Co. Ltd. is a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK as it is nothing but a far-fetched assertion to keep the ship under detention for an indefinite period and freeze its sailing in the end.
					
					 Secondly, the Wonyang Marine Transport Management Co. Ltd. is a company specializing in the management of trading cargo ships and is an independent corporate body.
					
					 Just like our company the Wonyang also has its own business license concerning ship management, crew management and mediation of ship chartering, etc. issued by the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport of the DPRK under its law and regulations.
					
					 Ship management offers one or more professional services to ship-owner company at its request irrespective of ownership.
					
					 Lots of ship-owners conclude contracts with management companies and entrust business activities to them in order to satisfactorily meet the requirements of regulations set by the International Maritime Organization on safety of human lives in the sea and on environmental protection and to raise efficiency of ship management that requires professional knowledge such as technical management of ships, hiring of crew, disputes and insurance. Data say approximately 35 percent of world trading cargo ships are managed by ship management companies.
					
					 If ships managed by lots of management companies of the world belong to management companies, ship-owners will burst into side-splitting laughter.
					
					 To persistently insist that Mudubong comes under the possession of the Wonyang which is responsible for the management of the ship would mean either ignorance of international marine transport usage or intentional denial of it.
					
					 Thirdly, the Wonyang Marine Transport Management Co. Ltd. is just responsible for those matters that require professional knowledge concerning ship management and operation including management for safety of Mudubong and technical guidance within the framework of contract signed with our company.
					
					 Our company quarterly pays management fee under the management contract signed with this company which in turn offers professional services for Mudubong.
					
					 Mudubong has been supplied with fuel and spare parts under favorable conditions and at reasonable price through this company that has contacts with many business partners in the world and it passed through canals and called at foreign ports at competitive costs with the help of this company and with its arrangement.
					
					 Our company and the Wonyang have equal relations as a client of special service and provider of special service on the basis of payment conditions and neither of them orders nor controls the other party.
					
					 To claim that Wonyang possesses and controls Mudubong simply because of the professional services it offers to the ship and touch it gets with foreign dealers for Mudubong at our request would be just a far-fetched assertion based on the way of thinking of the mentally deranged.
					
					 Mudubong has been under internment at Tuxpan Port for nine months and has been denied its departure for three months.
					
					 Its crew and their family members are suffering from unspeakable physical and mental pain due to this abnormal situation.
					
					 Our company has already suffered huge losses. If safe return of Mudubong, legitimate property of our company, is held in check, we are thinking of taking legal measures to have damage and losses indemnified.
					
					 I, in the name of the crew and their family members and in the name of all of us, strongly demand the parties concerned to stop meaningless controversy and the internment of the ship and ensure at once the safe homeward voyage of the peaceable trading cargo ship Mudubong on the principle of impartiality and humanitarianism.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Terms S. Korean Puppet Regime Chieftain of Scandals
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Terms S. Korean Puppet Regime Chieftain of Scandals
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Song Wan Jong, former president of Kyongnam Business Group of south Korea, committed a suicide, leaving a note on April 9. In the note he confessed to the fact that he offered hundreds of millions of won to the eight closest associates of Park Geun Hye including Ho Thae Ryol and Kim Ki Chun, former presidential chiefs of staff of Chongwadae, Ri Pyong Gi, incumbent presidential chief of staff, and Ri Wan Gu, puppet prime minister, each as political funds on a number of occasions such as the "presidential" election in 2012.
					 This case plunged south Korea into great mayhem. The Democratic Alliance for New Politics and other opposition parties and different circles brand it as a "big scandal involving all closest associates of Park Geun Hye", "the worst power-backed scandal gate in the history of the constitution" and "the worst scandal." They are demanding introduction of special investigation and impeachment of the present chief executive, while calling for probing the truth about it.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1090 on Friday in this regard:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group has cried out for "building a clean public society" but it is the kingpin of irregularities and corruption and a group of wicked criminals.
					
					 All the preceding puppet conservative regimes of south Korea have earned an ill-fame through scandals but it is the first time in history that such hideous scandal was committed by the ruling quarters.
					
					 The kingpins of such scandal have talked volumes about "morality" and "integrity" and "war against scandal." This is the height of impudence and insult and mockery of the south Korean people.
					
					 The chief executive of south Korea is the main culprit and mastermind of the case and Park Geun Hye can never evade the responsibility for it.
					
					 The south Korean people can never get rid of the miserable fate of being victims of the present corrupt regime as long as it is allowed to stay in office.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should come out to probe the truth behind the Song Wan Jong case without fail and sternly punish the present conservative group.

articles.title: 70th Art Performance "Songs Full of Memories" Staged
articles.content:
70th Art Performance "Songs Full of Memories" Staged
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- An art performance "Songs Full of Memories" took place here with splendor from Feb. 21 to April 16,
					 The performance has been given 70 times since it raised the curtain at the People's Theater. More than 108 300 officials, people from all walks of life, youth and students and service personnel in Pyongyang and local areas have enjoyed the performance.
					
					 The performance representing the past, the present and future of the Juche revolution powerfully aroused the service personnel and people to implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A performance was staged at the People's Theatre on April 15 and the 70th presentation, the last, was made on the next day before full houses.
					
					 It began with a narrative poem, prelude and orchestra and chorus "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun". Put on the stage were immortal classic masterpiece "Song of Loyalty", "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", "Song of Comradeship", "I'll Be the Flower to Herald the Spring" and "We Single-mindedly Cherish Our Loyalty" and other numbers.
					
					 The performance was given by singers well known among the people for their representation of theme songs of many films and artistes of the first generation of the Mansudae Art Troupe.
					
					 "Spring Reflecting Loving Care", "Smile of Love", "Whistles", "Pyongyang Is Best" and other songs presented by famous singers of the Pochonbo Electronic Band were highly acclaimed for the peculiar attraction of the Korean-style electronic music.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by trumpet solo "I Think, Looking at You", female sole "Frost Flowers" and female solo and pangchang "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" staged by the Wangjaesan Art Troupe.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Citation Awarded to Artistes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Citation Awarded to Artistes
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's citation was awarded to artistes who created art performance "Songs Full of Memories" and staged it.
					 The artistes staged the art performance, which was personally initiated and meticulously guided by Kim Jong Un, 70 times before more than 108 300 people. 
					
					 His citation was awarded to 72 artistes including Kim Kwang Suk, Jon Hye Yong, O Ryon Sim, Kim Pong Hui, Ryom Tong Son, Ju Chang Hyok, O Jong Yun, Ryom Chong, Kim Sung Yon, Choe Sam Suk, Paek Sung Ran, Jon Kwon, Song Kwang, Ri Ja Yong, Kang Se Hyok, Ri Jong O, Kim Man Yong and Hwang Song Ha.
					
					 A ceremony of awarding the citation took place at the People's Theatre on Friday.
					
					 In a speech Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, recalled that Kim Jong Un showed warm loving care for the artistes. This reflects his great expectation that they would glorify their whole lives on the road of trusting and following only the party, keeping in their mind the loving care and trust shown by leader Kim Jong Il who let them stand in the sacred ranks which ushered in a heyday of Juche-based art and led them, Choe added.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: People's Art Festival Closes
articles.content:
People's Art Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Fourth April Spring People's Art Festival closed with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Friday. It opened here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival praised the immortal revolutionary history and feats of the peerlessly great persons and powerfully demonstrated the fixed will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu, united close around the party.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture who is chairman of the festival organizing committee, officials concerned, the participants in the festival and other people in the city.
					
					 Special prizes went to the art groups of Changsong County and the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, itinerant art squads of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and the Tobacco Complex and the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					 The group prize was awarded to 17 units, ensemble prize to 17 art pieces and 20 units, creation prize to 40 persons and prize for best acting to 40 persons.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam said in a closing address that the festival was a significant and meaningful one which powerfully demonstrated the fixed faith and will of the Korean people to win the final victory of the Songun revolution under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, deeply cherishing the great pride and self-esteem of holding the President and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					 Then a closing performance was given by the organizations which proved successful at the festival.

articles.title: National Scientific Symposium on Kimilsungia Held
articles.content:
National Scientific Symposium on Kimilsungia Held
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A national scientific symposium on Kimilsungia was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday to mark the 50th anniversary of the naming of a beautiful flower Kimilsungia.
					 The participants heard papers on achievements made in researches into the ecology and cultivation of Kimilsungia and its dissemination in the past.
					
					 The symposium referred to the facts that seed cultivation technology has been put on a scientific basis to suit the biological features of Kimilsungia seed and the method of cultivating the flower established and introduced by finding out effective components for the growth of Kimilsungia in wild flora and using mixed extractive
					
					 Stressed there were that the rational temperature management method needed for raising large Kimilsungia on a regular basis has been established, the method of bringing Kimilsungia into bloom in four seasons while keeping the characteristics of species of Kimilsungia and having it stand unfavorable circumstances founded out and impact on some factors to blooming flower clarified.
					
					 Present at the symposium were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned and scientists, technicians, teachers and students.

articles.title: Iranian Military Attache Gives Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Military Attache Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Bahram Ghanbari Chelarasi, military attache of the Iranian embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the occasion of the Army Day of Iran.
					 Present there on invitation were general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials were on hand.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan headed by Kim Ryong Won visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 Members of the group laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The group arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Sci-tech Information Service Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Sci-tech Information Service Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Central Information Agency for Science and Technology in the DPRK has concentrated efforts on its advisory information service.
					 The main purpose of this service is to indicate, on the basis of the world trend and advanced science and technology and the latest sci-tech achievements made in the country, the most reasonable ways for the relevant units to take in their economic activities such as invention of new products and establishment of new production processes.
					
					 The agency successfully built a model regional information service base in South Hamgyong Province of the country under its plan to turn all provincial sci-tech information offices into modern and overall information service bases.
					
					 Efforts are now directed to generalizing this model in other provinces in a short period.

articles.title: Achievements in Nation's Sports Science
articles.content:
Achievements in Nation's Sports Science
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been witnessed in sports science in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Those involved in the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians developed new kinds of software for football, archery, gymnastics and weightlifting trainings.
					
					 And they invented aid apparatuses necessary for shooting and diving trainings.
					
					 Meanwhile, they developed various kinds of nutritious drinks for athletes.

articles.title: Ferry Sewol Disaster in S. Korea Was Product of Unpopular Rule: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ferry Sewol Disaster in S. Korea Was Product of Unpopular Rule: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The ferry Sewol disaster was an inevitable one caused by the unpopular rule of the south Korean puppet regime and its deliberate massacre, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Nothing has been settled properly though it is one year since the disaster. Such issues as recovery of all the bodies of victims, salvage of the sunken ship, probe into the truth behind the disaster, punishment of those responsible for it and apology of authorities have not yet been settled though they are unanimously demanded by bereaved families and people from all walks of life.
					
					 The puppet regime that has been busy rubbing salt in the wounds of the bereaved families and other people from all walks of life recently advanced what it called "enforcement ordinance for special law on the ferry Sewol".
					
					 As far as the ordinance is concerned, it is aimed to restrict the independent activities of the ad hoc investigation committee for the ferry Sewol disaster and prevent it from properly probing truth behind the disaster.
					
					 Under such situation one can hardly expect that the truth behind the disaster would be properly probed.
					
					 Far from probing truth behind the disaster, that may cause second and third ferry Sewol disasters.
					
					 The reality eloquently proves that people from all walks of life in south Korea should turn out in mass actions for forcing the present traitorous regime to step down in order not to allow the similar tragedy to repeat itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Anti-DPRK Reckless Remarks of S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Anti-DPRK Reckless Remarks of S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Hong Yong Phyo,  newly-appointed puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, in a recent "interpellation at the National Assembly" vociferated about "warning", "protection of human rights" and "happy unified peninsula" while referring to the issue of the "law on human rights in the north" and cried out for the adoption of the law.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Hong uttered only self-exposed that he is no more than a marionette echoing outbursts of confrontation maniacs under the backstage manipulation of Chongwadae.
					
					 By letting loose a litany of jargons he openly revealed his intention to follow in the footsteps of his predecessors who threw the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe through the frantic moves to escalate the confrontation of social systems.
					
					 There is nothing surprising in his ridiculous behavior as he was appointed to the post of minister for having done something to win the favor of the boss of Chongwadae. 
					
					 Hong's reckless remarks are outright denial of the DPRK's dignified system and revelation of extreme hostility toward it. He should clearly understand that this behavior can never be overlooked.
					
					 He is sadly mistaken if he calculates he can do harm to the DPRK through the trite worn-out anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by his predecessors. 
					
					 He had better behave himself, if he does not want to meet the same miserable end as his predecessors.

articles.title: Hunger Strike Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Hunger Strike Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Teachers Union held a press conference outside the building of the puppet National Assembly in Seoul on April 11 and staged an action of having their hair cut short and hunger strike for probing the truth about the April 16 tragedy, checking the retrogressive revision of pension for government employees, checking the moves for outlawing the teachers union, shattering the moves for retrogressive revision of the labor market structure and winning the victory in the April 24 general strike, according to Chamsesang, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 The chairman, senior vice-chairman of the teachers union and chiefs of the 16 city and provincial branches had their hair cut short in protest against the puppet authorities' retrogressive revision of pension for government employees.
					
					 The chairman of the union declared in a speech they would launch the April 24 action to win the basic labor right and have public pension increased.
					
					 The chief of the Seoul branch also declared they would stage actions till the present regime steps down.
					
					 Chiefs of other branches said they would stage actions to make the world where the 99 percent of the people become masters in protest against the regime keen to gratify the greed of one percent of the population.
					
					 The chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions in a speech of solidarity called for probing the truth about ferry Sewol disaster through actions and putting an end to the tyranny of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The teachers union in a press release clarified the will to intensify the above-said actions.

articles.title: S. Korean Teachers Demand Resignation of Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Teachers Demand Resignation of Regime
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- 111 teachers under the Teachers Union of south Korea posted on the homepage of Chongwadae on April 10 a declaration demanding the resignation of the puppet regime on the lapse of one year since the ferry Sewol disaster, according to Chamsesang, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 The declaration said they saw the incompetent regime which sent passengers to the bottom of the sea and shameless chief executive who had remained indifferent to the people's lives for seven hours.
					
					 It said they would force the Park Geun Hye regime to step down.

articles.title: U.S. Warship Anchors at Tonghae Port of South Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Warship Anchors at Tonghae Port of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' Aegis destroyer USS PREBLE, DDG-88 anchored at Tonghae Port of south Korean Kangwon Province on April 15, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the warship will stage together with the south Korean puppet navy a drill aimed at increasing the capability for joint operations in the East Sea of Korea on April 17 and 18.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers are escalating war drills while introducing preemptive nuclear strike means and equipment to the large-scale joint military exercises aimed to "remove" the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "occupy Pyongyang".
					
					 The north-targeted nuclear war drills in the sky, on land and in seas of south Korea every day with huge preemptive nuclear strike means involved clearly prove who is the criminal bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Japanese Organizations Voice Solidarity with Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Japanese Organizations Voice Solidarity with Chongryon and Koreans in Japan 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Japanese organizations made public statements denouncing the Japanese government's brigandish suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) from March 30 to April 1. 
					 The Saitama Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity said in a statement:
					
					 The government has persistently resorted to undisguised suppression of Chongryon. 
					
					 The Japan-DPRK relations have not improved owing to the obstructions on the part of the government. 
					
					 The government should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and opt for settling the past crimes and realizing normalization of the bilateral ties on the basis of the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration. 
					
					 The Saitama Society for Solidarity with Korean Women said:
					
					 The recent search was a challenge to the wishes of the Japanese and Korean peoples for the normalization of the bilateral ties. 
					
					 We will not remain an onlooker to the government's acts of inciting enmity between Japan and the DPRK. 
					
					 We strongly protest against the brutal action of the police authorities and extend solidarity to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 The Network Saitama for Providing Institutional Guarantee for Foreign Schools and National Schools urged the government to sincerely implement the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration and promote the normalization of ties between the two countries and stop at once the politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon. 
					
					 The Gunma Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity bitterly denounced the government's despicable suppression of Chongryon and expressed full support for the struggle of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan for democratic national rights.

articles.title: Koreans in China Celebrate Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in China Celebrate Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held an event at the Yuwen Middle School in Jilin, China on April 15, the 103rd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present at the event were Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, its officials and representatives of its umbrella organizations, Korean artistes, officials of the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang, members of the DPRK branches working in three northeastern provinces of China and Korean residents in Jilin City.
					
					 The vice-director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Jilin Provincial People's Government, the director of the Yuwen Middle School in Jilin and other Chinese personages took part in the event.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets before the statue of Kim Il Sung standing at the middle school and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 A meeting of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung was held. 
					
					 Choe Un Bok in her report paid highest tribute to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the founding-father of socialist Korea and the eternal sun of Juche, representing the profound reverence of the association and all Koreans in China. 
					
					 Immensely rosy is the future of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, peerlessly brilliant commander, she said:
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 A Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibition, photo and book exhibition and art performance took place to mark the Day of the Sun. 
					
					 Seminars, film shows and other events were held at the DPRK embassy in Beijing by the Zhongnan Regional Association under the General Association of Koreans in China on April 10 and in Shenyang, China by the Liaoning Regional Association of the general association on April 13.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the General Association of Koreans in China on Wednesday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The message said that the President performed great feats by founding the original revolutionary idea centered on the popular masses and providing the eternal treasure of the revolutionary traditions for the accomplishment of the Juche cause, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the country and the nation and weathering all hardships and ordeals during the anti-Japanese revolution, adding that they remain shining brilliantly along with the ranges of Mt. Paektu, the sublime ancestral mountain.
					
					 The President was the iron-willed commander who saved the destiny of the country by defeating the two formidable enemies, U.S. and Japanese imperialists, in one generation and the founding-father of socialist Korea and distinguished great political elder who developed the DPRK into an invincible socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence by leading the two-stage social revolution and socialist construction to victory, it noted.
					
					 It is the highest honor, pride and eternal happiness of the Korean nation to hold the President in high esteem as the eternal leader, it said, and went on:
					
					 The great revolutionary history of the President could be given steady continuity thanks to the wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il who considered it as his lifelong mission to carry forward and accomplish the Juche cause.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who regarded it as his lifelong mission to carry forward and accomplish down through generations the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu, true to the intention of the President and Kim Jong Il, is making tireless efforts to improve the standard of the people's living and build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The message expressed the resolution of the Koreans in China to build the General Association of Koreans in China, the patriotic legacy of the President and Kim Jong Il, into the overseas Koreans' organization trusting and following Kim Jong Un only no matter how the situation may change.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a meeting on April 11 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of the smiling President and leader Kim Jong Il and made bows to them. 
					
					 Kim Chil Song, chairman of the Confederation, in a speech praised the President as the father of the Korean nation as he was born in Mangyongdae and grew up, receiving patriotic education from his parents, formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union in his teens and created the Juche idea and liberated the country from the Japanese imperialists. He went on:
					
					 The brilliant victories in the construction of a new society after the liberation of Korea, the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists and the building of a socialist state would have been unthinkable without the revolutionary career of the President. 
					
					 The President was the greatest man in the 20th century recognized by the world. He is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressives in the world for his great exploits and undying contribution for the history and the nation. 
					
					 Other speakers said the motherland is developing beyond recognition under the tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and this gives great national honor to overseas Koreans. They expressed the belief that Korea would be reunified without fail. 
					
					 Then an art performance was given.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Celebrate Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Celebrate Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation held an event at the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka on April 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 On display at its venue were photos showing revolutionary exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also displayed were their works, books on their greatness and photos showing the people of the DPRK vigorously advancing united close around the party. 
					
					 Present at the event were Pak Phyong Won, honorary chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Far East of Russia who is chairman of the confederation in Maritime Territory, officials of Koreans' organizations in Maritime Territory and other compatriots, the DPRK consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka. 
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets in the name of the organizations of Koreans in different areas of Russia and bouquets before the full-length picture of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together on Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 Then followed a remembrance meeting. 
					
					 Speakers said that the behests of the President are being successfully implemented by Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the President and Kim Jong Il and all Koreans abroad sincerely wish him good health and happiness. 
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "Masikryong Ski Resort".

articles.title: Korean People Supported by World Federation of Democratic Youth
articles.content:
Korean People Supported by World Federation of Democratic Youth
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth sent full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people on April 4. 
					 The meeting discussed the issues of celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea on the international scale and conducting activities to support the just cause of the Korean people and youth during the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					
					 The statement on the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula was adopted at the meeting. It disclosed the reactionary and unfair nature of the hostile policy towards the DPRK and the dangerous nature of the war drills by the U.S. and south Korean belligerent forces.
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. to immediately withdraw its aggression forces and nuclear war means from south Korea to establish a stable mechanism for peace on the Korean peninsula, and unconditionally roll back the hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 It demanded the south Korean authorities respond to the DPRK's sincere and principled proposal on discontinuing the reckless military drills in league with outside forces on the peninsula and bringing about a great change in the inter-Korean relations in this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The World Federation of Democratic Youth is sure that the world progressive people and youth opposing war and imperialism and loving peace will join the Korean people in their struggle to smash the dangerous nuclear war racket of the U.S. and south Korean puppet group and achieve peace and reunification on the peninsula, it concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Glorify the Great Achievements of the Respected Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Ussuriysk City of Maritime Territory, Russia on April 9. 
					 The work, published on April 17, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the tasks to hold him in high esteem for all ages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Spain
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet by the Anfer Publishing House, Spain on April 10.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives and indicates tasks for firmly preserving and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Slam Japanese Government's Politically-Motivated Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Slam Japanese Government's Politically-Motivated Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement on April 7 denouncing the Japanese government for cracking down on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Koreans in Europe are enraged at the shocking news that the Japanese government searched the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon without ground and evidence even with an armored car involved, the statement said.
					
					 This was aimed at fanning up anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon sentiments in the Japanese society, it noted.
					
					 The action taken against leading officials of Chongryon which is playing the role of a diplomatic mission of the DPRK is little short of the declaration of a war against the DPRK, it said, and went on:
					
					 If the Japanese government persists in the suppression of Koreans in Japan, all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad will get firmly united to sternly punish Japan.
					
					 The Japanese government should make an immediate apology for the search of the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 It should clarify before Japan and world media that the search was illegal and forcible one.
					
					 It should apply the tuition-free program for senior high schools to children of Koreans in Japan and abolish the discriminating policy.
					
					 It should take concrete measures to prevent the recurrence of the action against Chongryon.

articles.title: Lecture Given in UK on Significant Days of DPRK
articles.content:
Lecture Given in UK on Significant Days of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given in the UK on April 11 in commemoration of the 50th anniversary of the historic Indonesian visit by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the 10th anniversary of publication of Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence".
					 Present there were personages of the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.
					
					 An official of the DPRK embassy in London was present on invitation.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said that the President visited Indonesia despite sweltering weather to attend the celebrations of the 10th anniversary of the Bandung Conference and conducted energetic external activities among heads of state and government of various countries.
					
					 Indonesian President Sukarno, attracted by the personality of Kim Il Sung as a great man and his words, praised him as the leader he respected most in the world. 
					
					 Although the times have advanced far and great changes have taken place in the international environment since then, the visit paid by the great leaders in the DPRK will go down in the history of the cause of independence against imperialism in the DPRK and the world.
					
					 The secretary general of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said he was impressed by the touching story about Kimilsungia and noble moral obligation of Kim Jong Il after reading his work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence".
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the lecture.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held in Peru, Iran and Germany on April 8 and 10 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru said it is natural for the world progressive people to significantly celebrate the Day of the Sun as the President performed great exploits for humankind.
					
					 The President not only enabled the Korean people to emerge most revolutionary and heroic people in the world but made undying contributions to the cause of global independence, the general secretary added.
					
					 The international secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru noted the Korean people are always winning victories in the struggle to defend socialism and sovereignty under the guidance of the great leaders down through generations. He went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are threatening the DPRK but it is no more than bluffing. No force on earth can match the DPRK growing stronger by dint of Songun.
					
					 A vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran praised the President as a prominent statesman and greatest man recognized by the world. 
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany expressed conviction that the President will be remembered by the Koreans and world progressive people as the sun and his cause will be successfully accomplished by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Corte Suprema de Rusia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Corte Suprema de Rusia
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, se reunio el dia 17 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de la Corte Suprema de la Federacion Rusa, encabezada por el presidente Byacheslav Rebezev, que le realizo una visita de cortesia. 
					Rebezev expreso la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad entre dos paises, en este ano significativo que acoge el 70o aniversario de la victoria de Rusia en la Gran Guerra Patria y de la liberacion de Corea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de coreanos residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de coreanos residentes en Japon
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, se reunio el dia 17 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon, encabezada por el vicepresidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), Nam Sung U, que vino aqui para festejar el Dia del Sol.

articles.title: Portavoz del CNCDP rechaza emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del CNCDP rechaza emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) publico el dia 16 una declaracion en relacion con que ultimamente, la banda titere surcoreana habla tanto de la "amenaza nuclear del Norte (de Corea)" para justificar el emplazamiento de THAAD en suelo surcoreano.
					El documento condena esa conducta como provocacion imperdonable contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y acto proyanqui y antinacional que busca el desastre nuclear a la nacion coreana y convierte el suelo surcoreano en la base avanzada nuclear de talla mundial, sumandose a la campana de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., y continua:
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos dicen que el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea es para hacer frente a la "amenaza nuclear del Norte". Estas palabras absurdas no pueden convencer a nadie tanto en vista del proposito de desarrollo, la mision y las especificaciones de THAAD como a la luz de la intencion estrategica y el objetivo agresivo de EE.UU.
					
					El objetivo de desarrollo de THAAD reside en tomar el dominio y hegemonia militar en la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste de Asia y sus blancos son varios paises de la region.
					
					Sin embargo, partiendo de su logica de bandido, los titeres surcoreanos hablan tanto de la "amenaza nuclear del Norte" dejando a un lado su crimen de haber colaborado en las maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Este hecho deja conocer el gran cinismo de ellos enloquecidos por el servilismo pronorteamericano y la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					La "amenaza de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte", que suelen mencionar EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana, no es mas que un pretexto para ultimar los preparativos de guerra nuclear al introducir en el Sur de Corea los medios de ataque preventivo nuclear como THAAD y establecer el sistema de defensa antimisiles de EE.UU. y para asestar en cualquier momento el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC y los paises vecinos.
					
					Sin lugar a dudas, el emplazamiento de THAAD agravara el peligro de guerra nuclear mundial porque el Sur de Corea se hara la base avanzada nuclear y polvorin nuclear mas grande para el cumplimiento de la estrategia norteamericana de aplastar a la RPDC y dominar la region de Asia-Pacifico y los paises vecinos se convertiran en blancos de ataque nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					La RPDC no estara con brazos cruzados ante las peligrosas pretensiones de los titeres surcoreanos y EE.UU. de desplegar el THAAD y fortalecera el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa para los maximos intereses del pais, la seguridad nacional y la paz regional.

articles.title: CRPP condena nuevo escandalo desatado en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP condena nuevo escandalo desatado en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 9, el ex presidente del Grupo Empresarial Kyongnam del Sur de Corea, Song Wan Jong, se suicido dejando testamento, segun el cual entrego en varias ocasiones, incluyendo las elecciones "presidenciales" de 2012, los fondos politicos valorados en cientos de millones de wones (moneda surcoreana) a cada una de 8 personas como colaboradores intimos de Park Geun-hye; Ho Thae Ryol y Kim Ki Chun, ex jefes del gabinete de los secretarios de Chongwadae, Ri Pyong Gi, actual jefe del mismo gabinete y el actual premier Ri Wan Gu.
					  Este incidente produce ahora gran revuelo en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Los partidos opositores como Alianza Democratica para Nuevas Politicas y habitantes de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea lo condenan como "incidente de corrupcion general en que estan involucrados todos los brazos de Park Geun-hye", "escandalo de abuso del poder por los seguidores de Park Geun-hye", "caso de soborno colectivo sin precedentes en la historia de regimen constitucional" y "peor incidente de corrupcion e irregularidades".
					
					Y estan exigiendo la "inspeccion especial" y el "proceso de destitucion" de la mandataria actual.
					
					  El secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 17 la informacion no.1090 condenando que la banda de Park Geun-hye son figuras principales de irregularidades y corrupcion y criminales asquerosos, aunque ella aboga por la "construccion de una limpia sociedad de funcionarios publicos".
					
					  Todos los ex poderes conservadores del Sur de Corea se ganaron la mala reputacion por los escandalos de corrupcion, pero el presente caso es el peor de la historia, apunta la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Sin embargo, esos caudillos de corrupcion abogan por la "moralidad", la "honestidad" y la "guerra" contra la corrupcion, lo cual es climax de descaro e insulto a los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					La mandataria actual Park Geun-hye, culpable principal, no podra eludir jamas la responsabilidad del presente escandalo.
					
					Si se deja intacto al actual poder tan corrupto, la poblacion surcoreana sufrira siempre el tragico destino de hoy.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores deberan esclarecer hasta el final la verdad del incidente de Song Wan Jong y sentenciar rotundamente a las actuales autoridades conservadoras.

articles.title: Presidente de compania coreana exige regreso seguro del barco Mudubong
articles.content:
Presidente de compania coreana exige regreso seguro del barco Mudubong
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo de la retencion injusta del carguero "Mudubong" durante 9 meses, el presidente de la Corporacion Limitada de Transporte Maritimo Mudubong concedio el dia 16 una rueda de prensa con la ACNC y dio la siguiente respuesta:
					El barco comercial "Mudubong" de nuestra compania sufrio la varada el 14 de julio de 2014 en el mar frente al puerto Tuxpan de Mexico y fue retenido por las autoridades mexicanas por haber danado el arrecife de corral.
					
					Despues de ocurrido el accidente, hemos hecho todas las recompensas financieras, inclusive los gastos de rescate, que establece el reglamento de Mexico.
					
					El 17 de enero de 2015, las autoridades mexicanas nos enviaron un documento oficial sobre la devolucion del barco y nos informaron que mandarian tambien otro documento referente a la liberacion del barco.
					
					No obstante, ellas no permiten todavia la salida de "Mudubong" diciendo que recibieron la solicitud del comite de sancion anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU de que no la autorizaran hasta cuando se saque la "conclusion" correspondiente.
					
					Recientemente, el llamado coordinador del grupo de especialistas del citado comite dio la indicacion de retener el barco coreano en nombre de su comite.
					
					Posteriormente, intenta congelar a toda costa el barco coreano divulgando unos datos erroneos de que esa nave es propiedad de la Corporacion Limitada de Administracion de Transporte Maritimo Wonyang que segun ellos, es blanco de "sancion".
					
					Eso es un intento injustisimo.
					
					En primer lugar, "Mudubong" es propiedad legitima de la Corporacion Limitada de Transporte Maritimo Mudubong, unidad juridica independiente establecida segun la ley de la RPDC.
					
					Nuestra compania es una unidad cooperativa social establecida en octubre de 2008 con los dineros invertidos de las personas individuales y tiene el certificado de inversion y el acuerdo de la fundacion de compania, ademas del certificado de la notaria correspondiente.
					
					Siendo propietaria del "Mudubong", nuestra compania obtuvo el permiso de navegacion otorgado por el Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo de la RPDC y su numero es 13-203.
					
					"Mudubong" tiene tambien el certificado de registro del barco, emitido por la Direccion Estatal de Control de Asuntos Maritimos de la RPDC.
					
					La Corporacion Limitada de Transporte Maritimo Mudubong fue registrada en la Organizacion Maritima Internacional como naviero de "Mudubong", cuyo numero de identificacion es 5435991.
					
					Si insiste en que "Mudubong" no es propiedad de nuestra compania a pesar de todos esos documentos de prueba reconocidos dentro y fuera del pais, eso significa la privacion del derecho de propiedad de los inversionistas, el desprecio de las leyes competentes de la RPDC y una negativa intencional a los competentes organos estatales de la RPDC que emitieron dichos certificados.
					
					El dicho de que "Mudubong" es propiedad y bien de la Corporacion Limitada de Administracion de Transporte Maritimo Wonyang no pasa de ser una insistencia destinada a congelarlo tras retenerlo por tiempo indefinido, siendo una violacion flagrante de la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					En segundo lugar, la Corporacion Limitada de Administracion de Transporte Maritimo Wonyang es otra entidad juridica independiente que se dedica al control de barcos comerciales. 
					
					Al igual que nuestra compania, ella tambien obtuvo la licencia de negocios independientes sobre la administracion de barcos y tripulantes, la mediacion de fletamento, etc., expedidas por el Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo de la RPDC segun la ley y el reglamento del pais. 
					
					La administracion de barcos es una labor para ofrecer uno o mas servicios especializados a la compania propietaria de barco a peticion de esta, sin tener nada que ver con el derecho de propiedad del barco.
					
					Para satisfacer los requisitos reglamentarios de la  Organizacion Maritima Internacional sobre la seguridad del personal en el mar y la proteccion de ambiente maritimo y elevar la eficiencia de administracion de barcos que requiere de los conocimientos especializados, entre otros, la administracion tecnica de barco, la contratacion de tripulantes, los litigios y el seguro, muchos propietarios de barcos contraen contactos con las companias de administracion y les encargan los negocios especializados. Segun las estadisticas, lo hacen aproximadamente el 35 % de los cargueros comerciales del mundo. 
					
					Teniendo en cuenta tales hechos, la insistencia en que "Mudubong" es propiedad de la Corporacion Limitada de Administracion de Transporte Maritimo Wonyang se consideraria como ignorancia o negacion intencional a las costumbres maritimas internacionales. 
					
					En tercer lugar, la Corporacion Limitada de Administracion de Transporte Maritimo Wonyang se encarga solo de la seguridad, la direccion tecnica y otras labores en que se necesitan los conocimientos especializados en la administracion del barco "Mudubong" en el marco del contacto concertado con nuestra compania. 
					
					Segun el contacto, nuestra compania paga en cada trimestre la cuota de administracion acordada, a cambio de la cual esa corporacion ofrece los servicios especializados al barco "Mudubong". 
					
					Por intermedio de la Wonyang que tiene muchas relaciones comerciales en el mundo, "Mudubong" recibio combustibles y accesorios de barco a precios y condiciones ventajosos y con su ayuda, paso los canales y arribo a los puertos extranjeros con gastos competitivos. 
					
					Nuestra compania y la Wonyang tienen las relaciones igualitarias entre el demandante y el ofrecedor de servicios especializados.
					
					Ya pasaron 9 meses desde la retencion del barco "Mudubong" en el Puerto de Tuxpan, y tres meses desde que fuera desautorizada su salida. 
					
					Debido a tal situacion anormal, los tripulantes y sus familiares sufren indecibles dolores fisicos y mentales. 
					
					Son enormes las perdidas economicas que sufrio nuestra compania en ese plazo. Si "Mudubong" no regresa sano y salvo, tomaremos las medidas juridicas para recibir la indemnizacion merecida. 
					
					En nombre de los tripulantes y sus familiares y en el de todos nosotros, demando fuertemente a todas las partes interesadas dejar la discusion innecesaria y la retencion y asegurar ahora mismo el regreso seguro del barco comercial pacifista "Mudubong" en el principio de imparcialidad y humanitarismo.
